title: Division?
description:
Codeforces separates its users into
4
divisions by their rating:
Given a
rating
, print in which division the
rating
belongs.
input_specification:
The first line of the input contains an integer
t
(
1≤t≤104
) — the number of testcases.
The description of each test consists of one line containing one integer
rating
(
−5000≤rating≤5000
).
output_specification:
For each test case, output a single line containing the correct division in the format "Division X", where
X
is an integer between
1
and
4
representing the division for the corresponding rating.
